title: Fix insurance company logo display to show complete logos without cropping

requirements.text: In the CompaniesSection component (frontend/src/components/CompaniesSection.tsx), modify the logo display implementation to ensure all five insurance company logos (Mutual of Omaha, Transamerica, Ethos, Fidelity and Guaranteed Life, and Forrester) are shown in their entirety without any cropping or cutoff, by adjusting container dimensions, object-fit properties, padding, and aspect ratio constraints so that each logo's full visual content is visible

quotes: yes looks good now i need you to fix the Insurance company logos. It is still cut off and I cannot see the whole thing.

acceptanceCriteria: All five carrier logos display completely without any portions being cut off
Logo aspect ratios are maintained properly
No visual cropping occurs on any logo element
The '+25 other carriers' card remains properly styled and positioned

constraints: Do not replace the actual logo image files
Maintain the existing layout structure of the CompaniesSection
Keep the '+25 other carriers' indicator in place
nonGoals: Changing the number of logos displayed
Modifying other sections of the website
